mapper.select: SELECT H.HELPERNO "helperNo", H.HELPERNAME "helperName", H.HELPERWORKAREA "helperWorkArea", H.HELPERSTARTTIME "helperStartTime", H.HELPERENDTIME "helperEndTime", H.HELPERPROFILE "helperProfile", H.HELPERSEX "helperSex", H.HELPEREMAIL "helperEmail", H.HELPERUNIQUE "helperUnique", C.CERTIFINO "certifiNo", C.CERTIFINAME "certifiName", CA.CAREERNO "careerNo", CA.CAREERORGAN "careerOrgan", TO_CHAR(CA.CAREERSTART, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "careerStart", TO_CHAR(CA.CAREEREND, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "careerEnd" FROM HELPER H, CERTIFICATION C, CARRER CA WHERE H.HELPERNO = C.HELPERNO(+) AND H.HELPERNO = CA.HELPERNO(+) AND H.HELPERNO = #{value}

SELECT R.REVIEWWRITER "reviewWriter", R.REVIEWDATE "reviewDate", R.REVIEWCONTENTS "reviewContents", R.REVIEWSTAR "reviewStar", R.REVIEWFILE "reviewFile", R.SERVICENO "serviceNo", F.FAMILYEMAIL "familyEmail", F.FAMILYNAME "familyName", S.HELPERNO "helperNo" FROM REVIEW R, SERVICEAPPLY S, FAMILY F WHERE R.SERVICENO = S.SERVICENO AND R.REVIEWWRITER = F.FAMILYNO AND S.HELPERNO = #{helperNo}
